segments.text: Hey . I'm a visitor from China . I love your music . It's the best I've ever heard . Will you please spare a little bit of time for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Thank you for saying that . Actually , those songs were sung for the first time today . I wrote them in the past two months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you wrote them all by yourself . That's amazing ! Are you a regular singer here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can say that . But my band and I also sing regularly in several other places , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool . Your guitar skills are very impressive . How did you learn to play like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I picked up guitar at an early age , maybe around 8 years old . Afterward , I taught myself by listening to some records of top players .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that's unbelievable ! You play so well , but you've never been to a real teacher . You will definitely be famous in the near future .
segments.speaker: S1
